text: The Sikh leader, Banda Singh Bahadur, had taken a defensive position at Gurdas Nangal. Mughal General, Abdus-Samad Khan as well as Qamr-ud-Din Khan deployed an army to take on the Sikhs. Eventually due to some issues Sikhs were captured by betrayal and the Mughals came out . ==References== Gurdas Nangal Gurdas Nangal Category:1715 in Asia Gurdas Nangal
title: Battle of Gurdas Nangal
